entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
